about_the_game:
A Living Story, Shaped by Your Words

Step into a rich fantasy world where every conversation becomes part of an unfolding tale. ChatNPC is a AI-driven visual novel, where every character is powered by a local large language model - meaning your private chats stay private on your computer, with no cloud processing or online servers involved.



AI-Driven Storytelling
Meet a cast of unforgettable characters: the warm-hearted tavern maid with a secret past, the grizzled warrior carrying old regrets, the mischievous elf hiding forbidden knowledge, or the enigmatic vampire who speaks in riddles. Every dialogue is unique, every choice reshapes the story, and every encounter brings new mysteries to uncover. Your words guide the narrative, forging bonds, following quests, and revealing hidden secrets.



A World That Responds to You

From the cozy warmth of a medieval tavern to the vast unknown beyond, ChatNPC offers an ever-evolving journey shaped entirely by your interactions. Engage in deep conversations, uncover rumors and legends, and influence the world around you - not through battle, but through words.



Infinite Stories
No two playthroughs are ever the same. Every chat is a fresh adventure, every NPC a storyteller, and every session a new chapter in a tale only you can write.

Are you ready to lose yourself in a story that listens?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i9 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeFore RTX 3060 6GB
  • Additional Notes: Please remember that this game requires enough power to AI model to run locally.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i9 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 32 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeFore RTX 3060 12GB
  • Additional Notes: Please remember that this game requires enough power to AI model to run locally.

short_description: Immerse yourself in ChatNPC, a retro pixel-art adventure where every conversation unlocks new stories. Interact with unique AI-driven characters, explore vibrant settings, and shape your journey through dynamic dialogue in this engaging, simplified RPG experience.
